item.title: Two PhD positions on efficient privacy-preserving techniques for data analysis and machine learning
item.description: How can the privacy of health-related personal data be preserved, while using data analysis and machine learning for innovative medical approaches? What privacy-preserving techniques should be used and how, to achieve given privacy and utility objectives? How to implement privacy-preserving techniques to achieve efficiency and scalability? Work on the answer to these questions as PhD candidate in our research group! See the details and apply here as soon as possible: https://vacatures.uva.nl/UvA/job/Two-PhD-Positions-on-Efficient-Privacy-preserving-Techniques-for-Data-Analysis-and-Machine/760571802/
